Modes Unit ctrs thds | links bits Access Methods Mux Overflow Description
Std Fast LL Fast Fast Bcast Slow Bcast
Low Lat Distrib

BGPM_MODE_LLDISTRIB		 Punit 6 4 14 no no yes no no no no Low Latency Distributed
Punit 14 bit counters
Indep upc_p operation
fine-grained instrumentation
low latency access methods
No ovf, ctx sw support
12 2 14 no no yes no no no no
24 1 14 no no yes no no no no
L2-I/O     64 yes yes         no
Network 6 11 64 yes            
SW Distrib

BGPM_MODE_SWDISTRIB		 Punit 6 4 64 yes yes no yes yes no no Software Distributed
Global accumulation in UPC_C
Punit 64 bit counters
Current thread counting
Counters controlled independently
12 2 64 yes yes no yes no yes no
24 1 64 yes yes no yes no yes no
L2-I/O     64 yes yes         yes
Network 6 11 64 yes            
HW Distrib

BGPM_MODE_HWDISTRIB		 Punit 6 4 64 yes yes no no no no no HW Distributed
Sync Control of Punit, L2 & I/O Counters.
Use Bgpm_Attach() instead of Bgpm_Apply() to attached Punit event sets to particular hardware threads
12 2 64 yes yes no no no no no
24 1 64 yes yes no no no no no
L2-I/O     64 yes yes         no
Network 6 11 64 yes            
Default
BGPM_MODE_DEFAULT		 Use mode value from environment variable BGPM_ENV_MODE, or use BGPM_MODE_SWDISTRIB by default.
